title: FWoMSG
content:
Has anyone got a copy of Fuzzy's World of Miniature Space Golf for download? Is there a website where I can download the full version? I tried the Underdogs and a number of AbandonWare sites but I can't find it anywhere.

Ideas, anyone? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-no.gif[/img]

title: Re: FWoMSG
content:
I have the demo, if you want that... I even have the ripped Adlib music + player. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

EDIT: Well well well! I found the full thing on an abandonware site. But since abandonware is illegal, I won't post the link here (eg. PM ME if you want it).____________
I have a boring signature.

...
Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site[/url].
